sentences.en: Ammonia is a very reactive chemical.
Fiber reactive dyes - from true chemical bounds between dyestuff and fiber.
sentences.cn: 纤维活性染料 -- 染料与纤维之间形成真正的化学键.

sentences.en: Fiber reactive dyes are from true chemical bounds between dyestuff and fiber.
sentences.cn: 纤维活性染料来源于染料与纤维之间形成的真正化学键.

sentences.en: Highly reactive and delocalized electrons would react with photons.
sentences.cn: 高度活性和非定域的电子应该能够与光子起反应.

sentences.en: In order to survive the competition a company should be proactive not reactive.
sentences.cn: 要在竞争中生存下来，公司不应该消极应变，而应当先发制人。

sentences.en: It is argued that the pyramidal radical would be more reactive.
sentences.cn: 可以认为锥形的自由基比较活泼.

sentences.en: Kodak company describes open chain reactive methylene two - equivalent yellow - forming conplers.
sentences.cn: 柯达叙述了一种直链的活性亚甲基两当量的黄成色剂.

sentences.en: Many calculations of the properties of reactive intermediates and transition states have also been performed.
sentences.cn: 活性中间体和过渡状态性质的许多计算机也可能被实现.

sentences.en: Many calculations of the properties of reactive intermediates and transition states have been performed.
sentences.cn: 活性中间体和过渡状态性质的许多计算被实现.

sentences.en: More reactive are the heavier isotopes of hydrogen, deuterium and tritium.
sentences.cn: 更为活跃的是氢的较重同位素, 氘和氚.

sentences.en: Ozone is a highly reactive form of oxygen gas.
sentences.cn: 臭氧是一种非常活跃的氧气形态。
反应表面可能被堵塞了.

sentences.en: Severe steric effects at the reactive carbon would impede the substitution.
sentences.cn: 大的立体效应阻止在碳上的取代.

sentences.en: The police presented a reactive rather than preventive strategy against crime.
sentences.cn: 警方对付犯罪的办法，不是事先加以防范，而是事后作出反应。
这些原子有较高的反应活性.

trans.tran_en: reacting to events or situations rather than starting or doing new things yourself
